We won't let you keep it all to yourself!
It's ours!!

3575.「そんな考え方をしては いかん！\n ここは 山神さまが 欲にとりつかれた魂を\:
Don't think like that! This is the place where
the mountain god appeases the souls of those
who were consumed by greed!!

3576.「行きすぎた欲望のために争い\n 滅びをむかえる歴史は くり返さないと\n オレ:
We swore to the mountain god that we would not
repeat our history of fighting and dying out
of avarice!!

3577.「山神なんざ いるもんか！\n ここは オレのもんだぁ！！:
There's no such thing as the mountain god!
This place is mine!!

3581.「な なんなの？ 今の声は……！？: W-what the? What was that voice just now...?!

3583.「キャー！\n あ あれが 怨霊ってヤツ！？:
Kyaaah!
I-is this what you'd call a ghost?!

3587.「欲深き者どもめ……。\n この地に眠る宝石は 誰にも渡さぬ……！:
Greedy insects...
No one shall have the jewels that lie in this
land...!

3589.「二度と足を踏み入れられぬよう\n 魂ごと 喰らってくれるわァァァ！:
I'll eat your souls so you'll never set foot
in this place agaaaaain!

3591.「か 身体に……チカラが 入らねえ………。\n あいつに……吸い取られる……。:
H-he's...sucking out...all the strength...
in my body...

3592.「ブロッゲン……さまの……\n チカラが……き 消えちゃう………。:
All of...Broggen's power...is g-going to...
disappear...

3595.「動けるのっ！？\n お願いだ……。あいつを 倒して！！:
You can still move?!
Please...you have to defeat it!!

3597.「お願いだ……。\n あいつを 倒して……！:
Please...
You have to defeat it...!

3603.「集えっ！ この地に眠る 強欲なる魂たちよ！\n そして 我に チカラを！！:
Gather!
All the greedy souls who sleep in this land!
Give me strength!!

3606.「ホッツィ！ <cs_pchero>！\n ここは わしにまかせろ！:
Hottsi! <cs_pchero>!
I'll take care of this!

3607.「お前たちは みんなを連れて\n 逃げるのだ！！: You two, take everyone and run!

3609.「何をしておるっ！ 早く行けっ！！: What are you doing?! Go, go, go!!

3615.「なんだってんだ……。\n この 真っ白い光は……。:
What is...
What is this bright light...?

3618.「ここが あんな バケモノつきの土地だなんて\n 聞いてなかったわよ！:
I had no idea there was a monster like that in
this land!

3619.「こんな場所が近くにある 町にいたら\n 命が いくつあっても 足りないわッ！\:
If we stay in a town with a place like this
nearby, we'll be cooked no matter what!
Mutch! Butch! Let's get out of here!!

3621.<center>勇気ある ドワーフたちよ 礼を言おう。\nよくぞ マアモンより\:
Thank you, brave dwarves.
You have done well in saving precious lives
from the Grudge Sludge...

3622.<center>この地に 渦巻いていた悪しき瘴気…魔瘴により\n我は チカラを失:
The demon miasma that swirls in this land...
has drained my power, so I have been unable to
contain the Grudge Sludge or bless the mines.

3623.<center>だが あの白き光……\n勇者覚醒の光により 魔瘴は消え\n我は:
However, that white light...
The light of the Hero's awakening caused the
miasma to disappear and I regained my power.

3625.「やはり……。\n 山神イプチャルの加護が 弱まっていたのは\n 魔瘴の影響であ:
I knew it...
The blessings of the mountain god Yppchal were
weakened by the demon miasma...

3626.「そして わしらを救った あの白き光……\n ついに伝説の勇者が……。:
And as for that white light that saved us...
At long last, it seems that the Hero has...

3627.「<cs_pchero> ありがとな！\n お前のおかげで 助かったぜ！:
Thanks, <cs_pchero>!
You just saved my life!

3628.「……そうであった。\n そのことについても 話しておかねば。:
...Yes, that is true.
I wish to discuss that as well.

3629.「<cs_pchero> 親方の家に戻るぞ。\n お前に 話したいことがある。:
We're going back to Hottsi's house,
<cs_pchero>.
I have something that I want to tell you.

3632.「わしが こうして起きていられるのは\n ワケあって わずかな時間だけなのだ。\:
For some reason, I'm only able to stay awake
for a short time. Forgive me, but I must be
brief.

3633.「<pc>よ。お前の 本当の姿は\n ドワーフではなく 人間なのであろう？:
<pc>.
Your true form is not that of a dwarf, but
that of a human, is it not?

3636.「その鏡は 真実の姿を映しだすという\n 伝説の ラーの鏡。:
This mirror is the legendary Mirror of Ra,
which is said to reflect one's true form.

3637.「マアモンと戦ったとき わしらは\n チカラを奪われ 身動きできなくなったが\n:
When we fought the Grudge Sludge, we were
drained of our strength and couldn't even
move. But you could still fight, couldn't you?

3638.「それは お前の身に宿る魂が ドワーフでなく\n 人間のものだったからに 相違な:
That must be because the soul that dwells in
your body is not that of a dwarf, but of a
human.

3639.「わしには わかる。\n なぜ お前が その姿となったのか……。:
I know exactly what this is.
I know why you became as you are...

3644.「ブロッゲンさまの杖さま。\n なんとか おっしゃってくださいよ！？:
Mr. Broggen's staff.
Can you somehow tell us what he was about to
say?!

3647.「……<pc>。\n お前と しゃべるのに ブロッゲンさまは\n ちっとばかり:
...<pc>.
It seems that Mr. Broggen pushed himself a bit
too hard while he was talking to you.

3648.「……おお そうだ。\n 今のうちに こいつを渡しておこう。:
Ohh, that's right.
I need to give you this while you're here.

3649.<pc>は ホッツィ親方から\n大陸間鉄道パス（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<:
<pc> received
an Intercontinental Rail Pass (Key Item) from
Boss Hottsi!<me 60>

3650.「大陸間鉄道パスは 持ってるだけで\n 好きなだけ 鉄道に乗れちまう\n そりゃ:
An Intercontinental Rail Pass is a valuable
item that lets you ride the train as often as
you want just by having it.

3651.「……ホントは いつか\n その身体の持ち主のほうの <pc>に\n やるつもり:
...I was planning to give it to the
<pc> who that body originally
belonged to...

3652.「まだ 信じられねえけどよ……\n ブロッゲンさまの話じゃ お前さんは\n ドワ:
I still find it hard to believe... But
according to Mr. Broggen, you're not the same
person as the dwarf <pc>, are you?

3653.「あいつは ぺーぺーの見習いだったが\n 文句も言わずに よく はたらいてくれて:
They were kind of a flunky as an apprentice,
but they worked hard and never complained.

3654.「いつか 世界をマタにかけて\n とんでもない お宝を 掘りだしてやるってのが\:
They always said that one day they were gonna
take the world by the horns and dig up some
amazing treasure...

3655.「だからよ。もし お前が その身体を使って\n 何かデカイことを やりとげてくれ:
So if you can use that body to do something
really big, I think they'd be happy.

3658.「ブロッゲンさまは おっしゃっておらレール！\n <pc>のように 姿を変えて\:
These are master Broggen's words! Those who
come back to life in a new form, like
<pc>, have a mission to fulfill.

3660.「その使命が なんであるかは\n いずれ 時が来れば わかるとして……:
You won't know what that mission is until the
proper time arrives...

3661.「使命を果たすために 助けとなるものを\n 今から 授けるのでアール。:
What I am about to give you will help you to
fulfill that mission.

3663.「さあ 冒険の書を出すのでアール！: Now, get out your Adventure Log!

3665.「おおおっ 一人前の証が\n <pc>の 冒険の書に！:
Whoaaa, the Mark of Maturity appeared on your
Adventure Log!

3666.「よかったな <pc>！\n これで お前は どこの国へ行っても\n 一人前だと:
Good for you, <pc>!
Now you'll be recognized as a full-fledged
member of society no matter where you go!

3667.「異国の おえらい王さまだって\n お前のことを 頼りにしてくれるかもな！:
With this, it's possible that even the great
kings of other lands may look to you for help!

3668.「うん。各大陸の大きな町や国で 活躍すれば\n その証として キーエンブレムって:
That's right. If you make an impact in a large
town or country in each continent, you can
receive a key-like medal called a Key Emblem.

3669.「まずは 世界中をめぐり 自分の実力の証として\n そのキーエンブレムを 集める:
The first thing you must do is go around the
world collecting those Key Emblems as proof of
your abilities!

3671.「さあ 本当の冒険の始まりだ <pc>！\n まずは このアグラニから 北西にあ:
Now the real adventure begins,
<pc>! First, head northwest from
here in Agrani towards the city of Gatara!

3673.「我々も もう 旅に出ることにするから。\n あの白い光…… 勇者覚醒の原因を探:
We, too, shall depart on a journey.
That white light... We must learn what has
caused the Hero's awakening!

3674.「なんだか スケールのでっかい話になったが\n オレも お前のこと 応援してるか:
Well, that was a long story, but I'm rooting
for you too! Good luck, <pc>!

4456.「そして ブロッゲンさまの杖さま。: And hello to you as well, Mr. Broggen's staff.

11280.「ホッツィ。\n その鏡で <pc>を 映してみてくれ。:
Hottsi.
Please reflect <pc> in that
mirror.

24640.「こ…… この気配は……。\n まさか……！？:
Th... this is a sign of...
No way, don't tell me...?!

26744.「本当に 残念だが……\n <pc>は もう……。:
I'm truly sorry, but...
<pc> is no longer...

26745.「オレの後ろに見えるのは\n 神カラクリと言ってな。\n アグラニ自慢の 昇降機:
That thing you see behind me is called
Master Machinery. It's Agrani's pride and joy.

26746.「ふっふっふ。この神カラクリを使えば\n 上の町まで 一瞬で行けるぞ。:
Heheheh.
This marvel of machinery will allow you reach
the upper part of town in no time flat.

26747.「この神カラクリってヤツは\n 何千年も前の 時代のものらしいが……。:
This Master Machinery is said to be thousands
of years old...

26748.「今でも オレたちを乗せて\n スーッと上まで 運んでくれる。\n いやはや す:
Even now, it can still carry us all the way to
the top. It's an amazing invention, isn't it?!

26749.「……そこで アグラニの人たちは\n 山神イプチャルに その事件を戒めにすると誓:
...So the people of Agrani swore to Yppchal that they would treat that incident as a warning to be more cautious and prayed for the
ghosts' grudges to be appeased.

26750.<center>これからは ふたたび この山神イプチャルが\n鉱山に関わる すべ:
From now on, I promise you that I, the
mountain god, will once again watch over all
those in the mine.

26751.<center>だが ゆめゆめ忘れるな ドワーフたちよ。\n欲望の牙は おぬしら:
But never forget, dwarves.
The fangs of greed are always lurking in your
hearts...

27034.「扉の横に 見えるのが\n 神カラクリを動かすスイッチだ。\n 上の町に行きたい:
The switch you see next to the door activates
the Master Machinery. If you want to go to the
upper part of town, you should check it out.

39087.ルーラストーンは 記憶させた場所に\n一瞬で移動できる 魔法の石です。\n何度使:
The Zoomstone is a magic stone that allows you
to travel to a recorded location instantly. No
matter how much you use it, it never runs out.

39088.このルーラストーンには\nまだ場所が 記憶されていません。\n移動する場所は 教:
This Zoomstone doesn't have a location stored
in it yet. You can record a location for it in
the church.

50740.「ここから先の旅は ひとりには つらいもの。\n サポート仲間という協力者を ３:
The journey ahead will be difficult alone.
I've arranged for three support party members
to join you on your journey.

50742.「岳都ガタラまで着けば 酒場で\n 新しいサポート仲間を 紹介してもらえるから\:
Once you reach the mountain city of Gatara, you'll be introduced to new support party members at the tavern, and you can pick and
choose who to take along with you.
